Crown of Overmight

auto spell [autocombatspell]: #1038 Charm
leadership [ldr-n]: +100
inspirational leadership [inspirational]: +1
(unremovable [cursed], crown [crown], wearer-gets-resist-magic-effect [antimagic])

Requires 40F15E to forge (F5E3)

This elaborate golden crown will graft itself onto its wearer's head when worn in order to keep it from being misplaced. Unfortunately, the gilded crown is so heavy and cumbersome that the wearer's movement will be severely hindered, should he ever be forced to move swiftly. It provides its wearer with an aura of royal awe, which causes people to flock to his cause and makes soldiers more willingly follow his lead.
